text: Peggy Sue Got Married is a 1986 American romantic fantasy comedy-drama movie. It was directed by Francis Ford Coppola. It stars Kathleen Turner and Nicolas Cage. Turner's character, Peggy Sue Bodell, goes back in time to 1960 when she attends her class of 1960 high school reunion in 1985. == Other websites == * Category:1986 comedy-drama movies Category:1986 fantasy movies Category:1986 romantic comedy movies Category:1986 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Time travel movies Category:Movies directed by Francis Ford Coppola Category:Movies about marriage
title: Peggy Sue Got Married
